nodes.text: Aurum, later known as the lost city of Aurum, was a city on the planet Tython that was built by the Tythans, the settlers brought to Tython by the Tho Yor ships in 36,453 BBY. Over a thousand years after the Tho Yor Arrival, Aurum was destroyed during a Force Storm, a powerful phenomenon that cause fierce weather and seismic activity on Tython. The city's destruction and the death of many non-Force-sensitive Tythans was a major factor in the decision that all non-Force-sensitives should leave Tython and settle the other planets in the Tython system.

Aurum was first mentioned in Dawn of the Jedi: Force Storm 1, a comic book published on February 15, 2012. The destruction of a city is shown on the page preceding Aurum's mention during Je'daii Master Ketu's narration, but it is not specified whether the city was Aurum.
